<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">        .<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstrbuilder/#ad88e27102395957e457fed8e73a085cf">addUse</a>(OpReg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We do instruction selections early instead of calling MIB.buildBitcast()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// generating the general op code G&#95;BITCAST. When MachineVerifier validates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// G&#95;BITCAST we see a check of a kind: if Source Type is equal to Destination</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Type then report error &quot;bitcast must change the type&quot;. This doesn&#39;t take into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// account the notion of a typed pointer that is important for SPIR-V where a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// user may and should use bitcast between pointers with different pointee types</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (https://registry.khronos.org/SPIR-V/specs/unified1/SPIRV.html#OpBitcast).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It&#39;s important for correct lowering in SPIR-V, because interpretation of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// data type is not left to instructions that utilize the pointer, but encoded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by the pointer declaration, and the SPIRV target can and must handle the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// declaration and use of pointers that specify the type of data they point to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It&#39;s not feasible to improve validation of G&#95;BITCAST using just information</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// provided by low level types of source and destination. Therefore we don&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// produce G&#95;BITCAST as the general op code with semantics different from</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// OpBitcast, but rather lower to OpBitcast immediately. As for now, the only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// difference would be that CombinerHelper couldn&#39;t transform known patterns</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// around G&#95;BUILD&#95;VECTOR. See discussion</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project/pull/110270 for even more context.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214" lineLink="#a2d4e715bbecedf15f5f072b1be7efdb5"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a2d4e715bbecedf15f5f072b1be7efdb5">selectOpBitcasts</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/spirvglobalregistry">SPIRVGlobalRegistry</a> &#42;GR,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineirbuilder">MachineIRBuilder</a> MIB) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineInstr &#42;, 16&gt;</a> ToErase;</span></CodeLine>
